results.heading: Anaari
results.body: You learnt absolutely nothing; zilch in two years. You count your blessings after two years because even you don't know how you survived online classes. But you are here, so there's that ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

results.heading: Survivor
results.body: You barely got away with your life, barely being the operating term here. You most probably dozed off in your classes (more power to you), and skipped the remaining classes. That is the only rational explanation for your ignorance. Or was this your silent rebellion all along (well played, in that case) üëè?

results.heading: Fuccha
results.body: Congratulations! You are on the right path. If online classes continue, you'll probably get better with time. You have both time and potential to get better at a redundant skill. Go you! üíÉ

results.heading: Khilaadi
results.body: You are hereby christened Supreme Lord of Online Classes. Please send us a picture of yourself with sunglasses. We'll post it in the nearest temple, so fucchas can seek your blessings before diving into the GMeet link. Donations will strictly be 50-50 though üòé

questions.questionText: You are asking yourself whether Leo's top stopped spinning, when the professor asks you to answer a question that is significantly tougher. What do you do?

answerOptions.answerText: Panic, and leave the meeting that very instant.
Unmute yourself, and mimic TV static.
Unmute yourself, and truthfully admit you don't know shit.
Lie on the floor and play dead.

questions.questionText: It's your least favorite class at the end of the day. The professor starts talking but has forgotten to unmute themselves. What do you do?

answerOptions.answerText: Go with the flow and enjoy a nice nap
Say something like, "Ma'am, your audio isn't audible"
Unmute and say, "The class has been canceled"
Leave and never return.
